title: FoI: Commission reviewing what public has right to know bans journalists from fully reporting its ...
text: A controversial commission set up to review what the public has a right to know under the Freedom of Information act has held its first briefing â€“ and then banned journalists from reporting it fully. A senior figure from the Commission met
